name: Quest for the soul gems
description:
A simple platformer that takes place in the before time of Endropia.

You play as Gibby, A  snow gel catbit (half cat half rabbit) she/he is out to save the world from Gafungus and his minions of sufficient evil and darkness!  What went down is, Gafungus made an addictive soda called "juicy soda" which corrupted the innocent catkin and other fauna into zombies, hostile ducks and snails.  The only way to turn them back is to beat them up.

Can YOU find all the soul gems and thwart Gafungus' plans for world domination?

Features:

*WIP* A inventory and collectables that have many uses from healing your health to increasing your maximum health by 1, 3, or 9!

swim, jump and scratch at enemies and collect coins to purchase health upgrades!

more features will be added in due time.
